scripts.deploy-to-production: ruby build.rb && publisssh build zooniverse-static/spacewarps.org && rm -rf ./build
scripts.deploy-to-beta: ruby build.rb && publisssh build zooniverse-static/spacewarps.org/beta && rm -rf ./build
scripts.deploy-to-demo: ruby build.rb && publisssh build zooniverse-demo/spacewarps-z8e && rm -rf ./build
